Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals and Salvador Perez take the field in the final game of a four-game series against Jose Altuve and the Houston Astros, on Sunday at Minute Maid Park.
The Astros rank 11th in MLB play with 161 total home runs.
The Royals have the 11th-ranked ERA (3.91) in the majors this season.
Astros vs. Royals game is scheduled for Sunday, September 1, 2024, at 2:10 p.m. ET at Minute Maid Park in Houston, Texas.
The game will be broadcast on Bally Sports and available for live stream on Fubo.
